trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Siren Song
entries: Lovely singing voices charm every humanoid or giant within 300 feet. The targets must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.
